case.title: everybody loves chocolate.. - 22 (nyc)
case.text: Hi :) My name is Jess Im 22 years old Current in college I am a working girl I am a busy girl trying to follow my dreams, I never really have time to meet guys, so I decided to try craigslist. If I could describe myself I guess I would say I am funny, outgoing, nerdy, loving, energetic. I am so much more, but you should figure that out. I am looking for someone to be friends with and potentially grow into something more. I love an educated man, motivated to go somewhere in life. I wouldn't say I have a type, so if you think your interested in me please reply. Lets chat, make sure to send a picture and a description about yourself
